author: lispczz
content: Hi all~.  Is it ready now for developers to lanuch a verkle tree geth node to join Condrieu testnet?   I cannot find any docs on this.      Both gballet/go-ethereum and parithosh/verkle-testnet dont have a README for this.   Thank you

author: lispczz
content: https://condrieu.ethdevops.io/ did not give instruction for building binary or docker.    Just build from source from gballet/go-ethereum?

author: lispczz
content: cannot find a peer using the enode link in the above doc. Is that enode still alive?
